instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MAC pro no sound
threads.message:
Hello, i have MAC PRO a1481, sn F5KPL0UXF694 

it has problem with sound output. Headphones jacket works and it has internal sound.

i am looking for schematics and parts.

threads.title: MAC pro no sound
threads.message:
[QUOTE="mobajer, post: 38895"]Hello, i have MAC PRO a1481, sn F5KPL0UXF694

it has problem with sound output. Headphones jacket works and it has internal sound.

i am looking for schematics and parts.[/QUOTE]

Not much to go on here.. what’s the history? 

The connectors on the boards for the main cables have extremely delicate pins like a CPU pins. These bend out of place easily. Have you take apart? 

Schematics are difficult to come by on this one. If you need to check anything against a known good board, let me know.

threads.title: MAC pro no sound
threads.message:
95% solved by cleaning audio jack deep inside.
Use cotton ear stick, or fine tweezer with cotton on tip.
Youtube can help you...
